channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: “Usualing”

item.title: Noticed

item.title: What Da Vinci Knew About The Heart Is Still Relevant Today
item.description: Scientists are starting to understand more about the small heart muscle fibers that Da Vinci showed in his illustrations over 500 years ago.

item.title: Defense In Data: The Key To Stronger Security For CISO Leaders
item.description: As security leaders, we can’t afford to be in the dark when it comes to the health of our cybersecurity programs.

item.title: Event-Driven Systems: Powering The Future Of Green Technology
item.description: By investing in real-time data capabilities sooner, we can build a sustainable future that’s not just efficient but transformative.
